name: Dragallus
printed_effect:
You can Expend {fire} in order to Suppress each
face-up card on an opponent's field until the
End Phase. Then Enchant {solar} from your Spirit
Deck and/or Underworld to this Dragallus up
to the number of cards Suppressed this way.
effect: You can Expend {fire} in order to Suppress each face-up card on an opponent's field until the next turn. Then Enchant {solar} from your Spirit Deck and/or Underworld to this Dragallus up to the number of cards Suppressed this way.
